opzioni: Start with deep learning models since they are the cutting edge and most advanced technology that we have now

quiz.domanda: The missing values can also be occupied by computing mean, mode or median of the observed given values.
opzioni: This is very unusual and not common in practice
This is a very simple and effective solution in case the learning method is not capable to deal with missing data
This is not possible, since that is just descriptive statistics about the features, and cannot be used to fill missing data
quiz.risposta: This is a very simple and effective solution in case the learning method is not capable to deal with missing data

quiz.risposta: The unwanted leakage of data from test dataset to training data set

quiz.domanda:
You have a dataset X of 1000 samples and number of features F = 4 features. You want to reduce the number of features F to 2 for data visualization. According to the goal, consider the following options. 
 OPTION A: Apply PCA to X and select only the first 2 Principal Components. 
 OPTION B: Apply the Feedforward Feature Selection to X and select only the first 2 more relevant features.
opzioni: Option A is NOT possible. Option B is NOT possible
Option A is NOT possible. Option B is possible
Option A is possible. Option B is possible.
Option A is possible. Option B is NOT possible.
quiz.risposta: Option A is possible. Option B is possible.

False: the USB bandwidth make this option not possible

quiz.risposta: An AI accelerator application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC) and the related board developed specifically for neural network machine learning
